Package com.soa.delegate

Interface Summary
EndpointDef  
EndpointLookupProvider  
HandlerContext Provides context for a message exchange to be delivered through application and classloader boundaries.
HandlerProvider Interface of the SOA Software delegate for handling/processing messages.
 

Class Summary
Attachment Holds an attachment to be delivered through application and classloader boundaries.
DefaultHandlerContext Provides a default implementation of HandlerContext.
EndpointDef.NameValue  
EndpointLookupProviderBroker Singleton shared across application/classloader boundaries for registering a EndpointLookupProvider and obtaining the registered HandlerProvider.
EndpointLookupReq  
HandlerProviderBroker Singleton shared accross application/classloader boundaries for registering a HandlerProvider and obtaining the registered HandlerProvider.
SourceMessage Holds a message to be delivered through application and classloader boundaries.
 

Exception Summary
DelegateConfigurationError Non-checked runtime errors largely caused by configuration errors
DelegateException Exception for reporting problems encountered by the delegate.
